items.content_html: A lightweight backend library built on Express.js
items.title: Kingrashy12/nexu: A lightweight backend library built on Express.js

items.content_html: A lightweight web app for the WatchAds Android application, allowing users to earn money by watching ads, completing surveys, and referring friends.
items.title: PRAJWALSINGHKALWAD/watchads-web: A lightweight web app for the WatchAds Android application, allowing users to earn money by watching ads, completing surveys, and referring friends.

items.content_html: A zero-race-condition fetch wrapper packed with essential features - timeouts, retries, interceptors, and much more, all while still retained a similar API surface with fetch. Power and simplicity in one lightweight package.
items.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A zero-race-condition fetch wrapper packed with essential features - timeouts, retries, interceptors, and much more, all while still retained a similar API surface with fetch. Power and simplicity in one lightweight package.

items.content_html: A lightweight npm package to create and manage scheduled tasks using Express middleware. Configure tasks via POST requests and execute them at specified times seamlessly.
items.title: Siyu9412/express-post-task-scheduler: A lightweight npm package to create and manage scheduled tasks using Express middleware. Configure tasks via POST requests and execute them at specified times seamlessly.

items.content_html: StickyNote is a lightweight web app for Twitch streamers to showcase live events like subscriptions and redemptions through customizable, draggable, and resizable sticky notes, enhancing audience interaction in real-time.
items.title: IktaVT/StickyVT: StickyNote is a lightweight web app for Twitch streamers to showcase live events like subscriptions and redemptions through customizable, draggable, and resizable sticky notes, enhancing audience interaction in real-time.

items.content_html: Lightweight rule engine, written in typescript
items.title: ilovepixelart/ts-rule-engine: Lightweight rule engine, written in typescript

items.content_html: React-Iconic is a lightweight npm package offering scalable and customizable SVG icons for React apps, ideal for modern and visually appealing interfaces. (npm i react-iconic)
items.title: devsany/iconic: React-Iconic is a lightweight npm package offering scalable and customizable SVG icons for React apps, ideal for modern and visually appealing interfaces. (npm i react-iconic)

items.content_html: A lightweight and multilingual management system for residential buildings. Administrators can manage announcements, debts, and residents, while users can view updates and their financial details.
items.title: akcatech/simple-building-manager: A lightweight and multilingual management system for residential buildings. Administrators can manage announcements, debts, and residents, while users can view updates and their financial details.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable React Native package to easily implement double-press functionality. This package allows you to handle single press and double press gestures on any component seamlessly, with built-in flexibility and performance.
items.title: bhanushalikaran/react-native-doublepress: A lightweight and customizable React Native package to easily implement double-press functionality. This package allows you to handle single press and double press gestures on any component seamlessly, with built-in flexibility and performance.

items.content_html: Performant and lightweight Node.js library to convert PDF file to images. Designed with high focus on performance and developer experience.
items.title: GreenFlag31/pdf-to-image-generator: Performant and lightweight Node.js library to convert PDF file to images. Designed with high focus on performance and developer experience.

items.content_html: Lightweight basic web-based IFC model viewer.
items.title: OcarCampos/ifcViewer: Lightweight basic web-based IFC model viewer.

items.content_html: A lightweight and type-safe EventEmitter implementation for TypeScript.
items.title: lilBunnyRabbit/event-emitter: A lightweight and type-safe EventEmitter implementation for TypeScript.

items.content_html: Lightweight, blazing fast, and sleek game site!
items.title: Neetify0/Ember: Lightweight, blazing fast, and sleek game site!

items.content_html: 🕒 This repository contains the core source code and configuration files for the website. Feel free to modify, extend, and contribute to its development to improve functionality, add new features, and ensure the ongoing success of the project.
items.title: Snigdha-OS/Snigdha-OS.github.io: 🕒 This repository contains the core source code and configuration files for the website. Feel free to modify, extend, and contribute to its development to improve functionality, add new features, and ensure the ongoing success of the project.

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.

items.content_html: A lightweight, mobile-first, and customizable portfolio / resume SPA ready for deployment
items.title: aykyiv/ebrief-elegant-portfolio-resume: A lightweight, mobile-first, and customizable portfolio / resume SPA ready for deployment

items.content_html: A lightweight and modern paste bin and url shortener.
items.title: greenhat616/pastebin: A lightweight and modern paste bin and url shortener.

items.content_html: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.
items.title: inversify/InversifyJS: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container  for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.

items.content_html: Jspreadsheet is a lightweight JavaScript data grid component for creating interactive data grids with advanced spreadsheet controls.
items.title: jspreadsheet/ce: Jspreadsheet is a lightweight JavaScript data grid component for creating interactive data grids with advanced spreadsheet controls.

items.content_html: A lightweight, customizable menu library for creating interactive user interfaces in userscripts. It provides a clean, modern design with support for various input types and keybinds.
items.title: FrozenProductions/Frost-UI: A lightweight, customizable menu library for creating interactive user interfaces in userscripts. It provides a clean, modern design with support for various input types and keybinds.
